cn.guide1: 后台所有页面的金额汇率仅供参考。
cn.guide2: 结束管理后一定要点击「登出」，而不能仅仅是关闭浏览器，以免他人利用您的电脑任意进入后台窜改。
cn.guide3: 在后台闲置一段时间后，会自动退出，请重新登入。

en.guide1: All the exchange rate shown on back-office system is for reference only.
en.guide2: When you are done using the back-office system, please remember to click logout. It does not only mean to close browser, also to prevent others to access to your computer and manipulate your account.
en.guide3: If the back-office system is idle for certain time, it will be automatically logged out, please login again.
